Issue.creator: mrshah-ibm
Issue.summary: Make Fabric CA Client consumable by other projects
Issue.description: Currently we have heard arguments when trying to use (vendor) fabric-ca's client code in our other projects that the code is not meant to be used or vendored in other projects. Instead of all other projects duplicating the effort of writing fabric-ca-client, can we please update the client code to be able to get vendored in other projects?
